snippet.title: Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows - Announcement Trailer EN
snippet.description:
Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows – The Ultimate Otaku Experience!
🌸✨ Manage your own Waifu pillow shop, sell exclusive designs like Hana-chan and Kaori-sensei, and become the heart of the Waifu fandom! Customize your store, host events, and bring anime passion to life. Are you ready to be the ultimate Otakupreneur?

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3361340/Shop_Simulator_Waifu_Pillows/
